revision.text:
{{Doomwiki}}'''ZDoomGL''' is an OpenGL [[source port|port]] of [[ZDoom]] written by Tim "Timmie" Stump (an earlier version was written by MichaÃ«l "Kokak" Ryssen). It is no longer maintained. Timmie started working on a complete rewrite in 2006, but development stalled and the project was ultimately abandoned. It is advised to use [[GZDoom]] instead.
==External Link== *[http://zdoomgl.mancubus.net/ Official ZDoomGL homepage] [[Category:ZDoom-based source ports]]
